basics.name: Amit Kumar Saha
basics.label: Enterprise Architect | Product & Engineering Leader | TOGAF & Azure Certified | Banking & Finance | Healthcare Revenue Cycle | Telecom
basics.summary:
More than a decade and a half of experience in leadership, architecture, design, development, migration and support of large-scale, distributed, scalable, enterprise software systems for Financial Services, Healthcare and Telecom industry.

Proven track record of delivering complex solutions on time by bridging the gap between business and technology through effective communication and stakeholder management. Adept at driving all phases of the software development lifecycle while mentoring and leading high-performing teams to achieve organizational goals.
